channel.title: [request] msn display pic [request]
channel.description:
ok out of all you artist and GFX'ers out there can someone make me a display pic for msn or if your bored with nothing to do you can make a client background for my bigmacscape client wich i am releasing soon!!
[glow=red,2,300]Msn display pic:[/glow]
just like this [glow=orange,2,300]http://img218.imageshack.us/my.php?image=gaarasighb4.png[/glow]
but with a picture of a bigmac and with that text saying BigMacScape in like the size of a msn display pic wich most people know allready.
[glow=red,2,300] Client Background[/glow]:
just the same as the above sig picture but with the size of a client background and with a picture of a bigmac or a burger with BigMacScape in the text. Also the maker can put made by (name) in the bottom right corner.
For further questions such as the client background size or any questions involving my client contact me on msn messanger ---- samma100@hotmail.com[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 09:45:14 AM[/size][hr]*bump* please someone

item.title: [request] msn display pic [request]
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

lol no way does it suck im just seeing if any1 else fancies giving it a go then ok =s im going to request a new one soon i am going to make c’warz scape
